about_the_game:
Fight six different enemy types in a fast-paced series of waves that increase in difficulty over time. With six unique maps to explore, forget about storylines, quests, or complex mechanics. This is gaming boiled down to its most basic principle: FUN.

Key Features:

  • Graphics: Pill Fight features a low-poly, minimalist art style, giving each enemy a truly unique look. The style is easy on the eyes and ensures smooth gameplay on virtually any system.

  • Map Variety: A total of six maps to keep the action fresh! The demo includes one map: a vibrant cityscape featuring a working bus that you can ride.

  • Frantic Action: Don’t let the friendly visuals fool you—things escalate quickly. Careless players can easily find themselves overwhelmed by sheer numbers.

  • Enemy Variety: The game features six distinct enemy types, each with unique behaviors and requiring different strategies to defeat.

content_descriptors.notes: The game features capsule shaped enemies chasing after the player, if these capsule's are attacked by the enemy they will break into multiple pieces.
